org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.gui.dnd.listeners
Class AbstractGuiDropListener

java.lang.Object
  org.objectweb.cjdbc.console.gui.dnd.listeners.AbstractGuiDropListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener, java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener, java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackendTransferListener, ControllerTransferListener
public abstract class AbstractGuiDropListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.awt.dnd.DragSourceListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener

This class defines a AbstractGuiDropListener. This is mainly to hide all the method we don't need to implement for all of the drop listeners.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicolas Modrzyk
